item.name: MySQL Special Query cache hit rate

trigger.name: Disk usage for {$DB_PART} on {HOSTNAME}
trigger.description: Partition is running out of space. Please increase volume size, delete unnecessary files and inform application owner.

trigger.name: Federal Admin Reserve Bank {$DB_PART}/FEDERAL_ADMIN_RESERVE_BANK on {HOSTNAME}
trigger.description:
Reserved disk space for database emergency situations. If disk space is exceeded, you can delete this file to gain space for proper shutdown.
Typically create a file using the following command: dd if=/dev/zero of={$DB_PART}/FEDERAL_ADMIN_RESERVE_BANK count=512 bs=1M

trigger.name: MySQL Service - Check Service Available
trigger.description: Checks of MySQL Server is up and running. Raises a alert if does not provide a measue for 300 seconds or the uptime does not change anymore (in this case mysql_extend was not able to update the value).

trigger.name: MySQL Service - Connections
trigger.description: This trigger gets active if 90% of all configured database connections are in use.

trigger.name: MySQL Service - Slave Seconds behind master (1h)
trigger.description: Slave is more than one hour behind master server.

dependency.name: MySQL Service - Slave Seconds behind master (3h)

trigger.name: MySQL Service - Slave Seconds behind master (3h)
trigger.description: Slave is more than 3 hours behind master server.

trigger.name: MySQL Service - Slave SQL thread stopped
trigger.description: SQL thread has stopped. This is usually because it cannot apply a SQL statement received from the master.
